snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [136] Phantasy Star II Text Adventures (Part 1 of 3)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

Each of the games takes place shortly before Phantasy Star II, documenting the backgrounds of its 8 characters, and explaining what brings them to the town Paseo where they eventually team up to investigate the pervasive troubles of the Algol Solar System. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
